title: Looking for a special peep to play support for me
body:
Im an ADC main in silver. Gold last season but deranked to help friends now im on the climb to gold again. Just message me your discord on league and details and lets get climbing shall we?
msg me if ya want! Kylokylo is my ign for league.
i got discord and skype.
<3 <3

replies.body:
I mean if you think you're a _decent_ ADC, i'd love to play a few norms to trial bot lane synergy with you !

Then we can play some ranked flex q :)
do i also have to suck your dick?
Yeah, just add me if you need one. Just expect alotta crying from both sides though >.>

bruh ill down to duo i am a support main  i already sent add friend ign drsoloq
{{champion:53}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:89}}
